english: Once he took the vow his loyalty never wavered .
The ranks were shaken , but not broken .
No one could stir him from his resolve .
chinese: 谁也动摇不了他的决心。

english: Yasha often envied their unswerving faith .
chinese: 雅夏经常羡慕他们毫不动摇的信仰。
她动摇了，畏缩了，屈服了。
动摇造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His resolution had begun to stagger .
His resolution is not to be shaken by anything ...
chinese: 他的决心是怎么也动摇不了的。

english: I found my colleagues very stiff and tough .
chinese: 我发觉我的同僚都很坚决，毫不动摇。

english: Khrushchev had remained unmoved and immovable .
chinese: 赫鲁晓夫一直不为所动，毫不动摇。

english: The terrible defeat has shaken the army morale ...
chinese: 那次惨败动摇了这支部队的士气。

english: Nothing could shake, change or ruffle him .
chinese: 没有什么事情能够动摇、改变或者触怒他。

english: Mrs. touchett indulged in no regrets not speculations .
chinese: 杜歇夫人却毫不反悔，也没有动摇。

english: Margaret never wavered in her determination to get on .
chinese: 玛格丽特奋发向上的决心从未动摇过。
她是不可动摇的，不可理解的，不可捉摸的。
